AspectLibrary.Name: PER.Tracy
AspectLibrary.Author: ConfigG
AspectLibrary.Summary: Unofficial C# bindings for Tracy Profiler, a real time, nanosecond resolution, remote telemetry, hybrid frame and sampling profiler for games and other applications.
AspectLibrary.Description: The package contains a transitive fabric that adds profiling to all types in any project referencing the package.
